title: Researchers train AI to diagnose heart failure in rural patients using low-tech electrocardiograms
description: Concerned about the ability of artificial intelligence models trained on data from urban demographics to make the right medical diagnoses for rural populations, West Virginia University computer scientists have developed several AI models that can identify signs of heart failure in patients from Appalachia.
